metadata.title: Prompt-User-Incident-Post-AdaptiveCard
metadata.description: This playbook is intended to be run from a Microsoft Sentinel incident. It will disable the Azure AD user accounts associated with the entities from Microsoft Sentinel incidents.

body.message: The user did not respond to the request or the request was skipped or failed.

body.taskDescription: The number of users exceeds 1. Investigate manually or trigger a different playbook.
